name: Taiba Investment Company
description: Taiba Investment Company invests in, buys, owns, develops, sells, leases, operates, maintains, markets, and manages real estate properties in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It operates through Real Estate, Tourism, and Property Management segments. The company also invests in, owns, operates, maintains, and manages hotels, commercial centers, hospitals, recreational and other residential, non-residential and tourism facilities. In addition, it is involved in the architectural, civil, mechanical, electrical, agricultural, and industrial contracting; and industrial and mining activities. Further, the company provides credit and mortgage services. The company was formerly known as Taiba Holding Co. and changed its name to Taiba Investment Company in May 2019. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
